body_html:
The random_(from, to) function will fill a tensor with random integers in the specified range.

You'll want to do something like randn but with random_ instead of normal_. (See SsnL's pointer to relevant files above).
body_text:
The random_(from, to) function will fill a tensor with random integers in the specified range.
You'll want to do something like randn but with random_ instead of normal_. (See SsnL's pointer to relevant files above).
body:
The `random_(from, to)` function will fill a tensor with random integers in the specified range.

You'll want to do something like `randn` but with `random_` instead of `normal_`. (See SsnL's pointer to relevant files above).
